title: Separations Processes
description: Fundamentals of equilibrium-stage and continuous contacting operations.  Applications of principles to distillation, absorption/stripping, extraction, absorption, and other separation technologies.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (CHBE 3130 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CHBE 2140 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C) and ((CHBE 3200 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and CHBE 3210 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C) or CHBE 3215 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C)
